title: How to Download load Hindi songs - Quora

response.answer_text: If want to download your favorite Hindi Bollywood song , Then Here I am sharing tips step by step. 1 You will be go firstly on YouTube then search your song and select the video song 2 After that, Open online YouTube Audio downloader  You can the images of online YouTube audio downloader 3 Copy the Video url 4 Paste the url for downlaoding 5 Press the submit button 6 After that, Downloading star, wait, after download, you can downlaod the audio file 7 By this converter, you can also download any web video This converter name is RAP Converter , It converts any types of video, audio, images and others. So Lets go for it. Thanks

Or else You can even go for english, Tamil, and all the other languages songs. So i suggest Yolosongs.com will be perfect for you to find the song. Happy listening. :))

use ganna app for it…you will get free trial by sharing with other people…for each share you get 30days trial…on its trial period u can download unlimited songs you like… you can use this link to get 30days trial, share your own code with others to get more free usage http://gaana.net/ASH6XAH

Just Google the song the song which you want to download you will get the links . Just open that link after that click to download . The song starts to download .

Just type the name of the song with mp3 Download on Google. Then click on any of the results. Select the quality and download. If you don't get how to download on any website try another website. It's easy actually. :) Good luck
